daily_activities: Morning: Hiking at Mount Batur to watch the sunrise
Afternoon: Visit the Bali Museum to learn about the island's history and culture
Evening: Explore the nightlife at Kuta Beach
Morning: Adventure sports - Surfing at Nusa Dua
Afternoon: Shopping at the Ubud Art Market
Evening: Dining at a traditional Balinese restaurant in Seminyak
Morning: Sightseeing at the Tirtha Empul Temple
Afternoon: Hiking at the Campuhan Ridge Walk
Evening: Nightlife at the Finns Beach Club
Morning: Visit the Agung Rai Museum of Art
Afternoon: Shopping at the Galeria Mall
Evening: Dining at a seafood restaurant at Jimbaran Bay
Morning: Adventure sports - White-water rafting at the Ayung River
Afternoon: Sightseeing at the Uluwatu Temple
Evening: Enjoy the sunset at the Single Fin bar

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: Approximately 8 hours and 30 minutes to 10 hours, depending on the flight route and layovers
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to Ngurah Rai International Airport (DPS) in Bali, possibly with layovers in cities like Mumbai, Delhi, or Singapore, depending on the airline and route
